metaData.label: ЖЗ
metaData.criteriaDescription: SPECIALTY_1 equal Obstetrics Gynaecology OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Gynaecology

metaData.label: Дети
metaData.criteriaDescription: SPECIALTY_1 equal Paediatrics OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Pediatric Neurology OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Child Dental Therapists OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Pediatric Surgery OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Child Reanimation OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Pediatric Allergy OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Pediatric Endocrinology OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Child/Adolescent Psychiatrist OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Dermatology Child OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Gynaecology Child OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Paediatric Oncologist OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Pediatric Rheumatology OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Perinatology

metaData.label: COVID/HIV:
metaData.criteriaDescription: SPECIALTY_1 equal Infectious Diseases OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Phthisiology OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Epidemiology OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Hygiene OR SPECIALTY_1 equal HIV/AIDS Medicine OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Virology

metaData.label: Онко
metaData.criteriaDescription: SPECIALTY_1 equal Oncology OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Chemotherapy OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Oncology Surgery OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Urology/Urology Surgery OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Oncology Radiotherapy OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Urology OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Haematology OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Anatomic Pathology

metaData.label: ЛОР
metaData.criteriaDescription: SPECIALTY_1 equal Otorhinolaryngology OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Otolaryngology (ENT) Child OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Pulmonologist OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Allergy and Immunology OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Pediatric Allergy OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Audiology OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Phoniatry

metaData.label: Гастро
metaData.criteriaDescription: SPECIALTY_1 equal Ultrasonic Diagnostics OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Gastroenterology OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Endoscopy OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Nephrology OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Pediatric Gastroenterology OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Dietetics OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Hepatology OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Dermatology

triggeredSend.preHeader: У большинства детей с COVID-19 симптомы отсутствуют или выражены слабо. Тяжелые респираторные проявления, требующие госпитализации или перевода в отделение интенсивной терапии, чаще встречаются...
